mapper.select:
SELECT
from ( SELECT
from auth_menu where is_enable = true and is_public = true UNION ALL SELECT
from auth_menu where is_enable = true and is_public = false and id in ( SELECT distinct authority_id FROM auth_role_authority ra INNER JOIN auth_user_role ur on ra.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN auth_role r on r.id = ra.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.status = true and ra.authority_type = 'MENU' ) ) tmp ORDER BY sort_value asc
